title: (x) Script in new Gap ads - Bickham Script {Tiff}
content:
[http://secure.www.gap.com/assets/directory/gap/wdir\_hero.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054617/http:/secure.www.gap.com/assets/directory/gap/wdir_hero.gif)   
   
(the font that says "Spring is here")   
   
Any guesses?   
   
   
(and a follow-up question....anyone got some script faves you wanna share? Something not too frilly?)
author: myfreakinuserid

comments.content:
Thanks for the list Stephen. There may be one or two scripts I haven't collected there.   
   
BTW, I see you have added the point size settings for the samples/test drive -- very good responsiveness!   
   
Can you also add year of design, please?
